name: ✨Dispirited✨
description:
For spirits and cryptid creatures, healthcare is difficult when 99% of the population doesn’t believe you exist. Players take on the role of experimental surgeons, using their conversational and metaphysical steady hands to understand and then cure mysterious cryptids of their physically manifested existential crises, even from deep inside. A spirit surgery simulator in glorious VR! Features & Controls

As mentioned previously, this is an interactive roomscale VR experience  exclusive to the HTC Vive. The controls are simple and accessible - simply use the trigger to  interact with objects, primarily to pickup (and maybe throw?) objects. 

The following is an interactive demo of something we are continue to develop further with additional controls and exploring platforming and puzzles in VR, as well as narratives and visual aesthetics we never don't really see in VR and exploring deeper emotions and mental states within us.
